name: Roxam
aura: Increase Ally C. RATE in Doom Tower battles by 23

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy.

Has a 50% chance of filling this Champion’s Turn Meter by 10%. Also has a 50% chance of placing a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 1 turn if this attack is critical.
skills.name: Chroma Shift
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 50%.

Has a 75% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff on the target for 1 turn when attacking while under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff.

Has a 75% chance of placing a [Sleep] debuff on the target for 1 turn when attacking without a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff.

Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns after attacking without a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff.
skills.name: Jungle Ambush
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc:
[While under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff]

Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff and a 25% [Weaken] debuff. Decreases the cooldown of the Jungle Ambush Skill by 2 turns.

[While not under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff]

Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff and a 25% [Weaken] debuff on the target for 2 turns before attacking. Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns after attacking.
skills.name: Flicker Step
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Places a [Block Debuffs] and a 25% [Strengthen] buff on this Champion for 1 turn, and a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff for 2 turns whenever they receive a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff.
skills.name: Chameleon [P]
